Title: Orison
Plot: Reverend Orison hopes to save Donnie Pfaster's soul by helping him break out of prison, but Donnie immediately plans to go after the victim that once escaped him... Scully.
GuestStars: Scott Wilson, Nick Chinlund, Steve Rankin, Emilio Rivera, Lisa Kushell, Rick Cramer, Tara Buck, Irene Muzzy, Eric Buker
